attributes.action: INVESTIGATION OF PESTICIDE/HERBICIDE USE/MISUSE / TOXIC HEALTH EFFECTS IN HUMANS/ANIMALS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like the Government to investigate the proceedure regarding misuse of approved/nonapproved Highly Toxic Pesticides/Herbicides used in Crop Spraying.
Urgent need for recognition risk/ assessment with regard to TOXIC HEALTH EFFECTS IN HUMANS/ANIMALS.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
